data.title: Thunderbird Senior Living
data.meta_description: Read 130 reviews, see photos, get pricing, and compare Thunderbird Senior Living with other senior living facilities near Glendale.
data.text:
Start a new chapter of life at Thunderbird Senior Living’s upscale community, where they offer independent living, assisted living, and memory care. The expansive, multi-story building features oversized windows, resort-style amenities, and a color scheme reminiscent of the desert. Situated near Banner Thunderbird Medical Center, Thunderbird Senior Living places residents close to essential local resources and attractions.

With the feel of a luxury resort, the stunning indoor common areas welcome you into a vibrant, southwestern-style community. Feel confident knowing you can age in place with the full spectrum of services at Thunderbird Senior Living. Those in independent living recieve housekeeping and transportation services, while those in memory care receive personalized, holistic care through the “embrace” memory care program. For those who opt for assisted living and memory care, the dedicated care team provides personalized services to meet the individual needs of each resident.

The health and safety of residents remains a top priority at Thunderbird Senior Living. Enjoy tasty, nutritious meals in the elegant restaurant-style dining space, or grab a casual bite at the cheerful bistro. You can relax by the fireplace on chilly evenings, find a cozy spot to read your favorite novel, or join your friends for painting in the...

A Place for Mom has scored Thunderbird Senior Living 8.9 out of 10 using our proprietary review score.

We assign review scores to give a more reliable view into senior living communities and home care agencies. Our review scores prioritize reviews that are recent — the past 24 months — because we know families need current information when choosing senior care.

Those with many recent, positive reviews receive a high review score, while providers with few recent reviews — regardless of how positive — receive a lower review score. Communities with no recent reviews will not have a review score, even if older reviews are positive. The maximum A Place for Mom review score a community can receive is 10 points.
